data.client_settings: Web Stable 20174 - EdgeHTML v17.17134 - Firefox v61.0.1
data.actual_result: The bot tag is only partially visible
data.expected_result: The name would be shortened more, and the bot tag would be fully visible
data.short_description: [Edge / Firefox] Bot tag gets cut off if the bot has a long username/nickname
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Discord on your browser (this was tested on Edge and Firefox) - Add a bot to your server, or you can use a bot already in your server for this - Nickname the bot at 32 characters - Observe the bot tag in the member list
